metadata.title: CVE-2023-52846 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:hsr: Prevent use after free in prp_create_tagged_frame()The prp_fill_rct() function can fail.  In that situation, it frees theskb and returns NULL.  Meanwhile on the success path, it returns theoriginal skb.  So it's straight forward to fix bug by using the returnedvalue.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
